00984 //#define SCROLL_TEST
00985 
00986 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00987 void ScrollJA2Background(UINT32 uiDirection, INT16 sScrollXIncrement, INT16 sScrollYIncrement, LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 pSource, LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 pDest, BOOLEAN fRenderStrip, UINT32 uiCurrentMouseBackbuffer )
00988 {
00989       UINT16 usWidth, usHeight;
00990       UINT8  ubBitDepth;
00991   HRESULT ReturnCode;
00992   static RECT    Region;  
00993       static UINT16      usMouseXPos, usMouseYPos;
00994       static RECT        StripRegions[ 2 ], MouseRegion;
00995       UINT16                         usNumStrips = 0;
00996       INT32                          cnt;
00997       INT16                          sShiftX, sShiftY;
00998       INT32                          uiCountY;
00999 
01000 
01001       GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usWidth, &usHeight, &ubBitDepth );
01002       usHeight=(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y );
01003 
01004 ///zmiany
01005       StripRegions[ 0 ].left   = gsVIEWPORT_START_X ;
01006       StripRegions[ 0 ].right  = gsVIEWPORT_END_X     ;
01007       StripRegions[ 0 ].top    = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y ;
01008       StripRegions[ 0 ].bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y ;
01009       StripRegions[ 1 ].left   = gsVIEWPORT_START_X ;
01010       StripRegions[ 1 ].right  = gsVIEWPORT_END_X;
01011       StripRegions[ 1 ].top    = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
01012       StripRegions[ 1 ].bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y;
01013 
01014       MouseRegion.left        = gMouseCursorBackground[ uiCurrentMouseBackbuffer ].usLeft;
01015       MouseRegion.top               = gMouseCursorBackground[ uiCurrentMouseBackbuffer ].usTop;
01016       MouseRegion.right       = gMouseCursorBackground[ uiCurrentMouseBackbuffer ].usRight;
01017       MouseRegion.bottom      = gMouseCursorBackground[ uiCurrentMouseBackbuffer ].usBottom;
01018 
01019       usMouseXPos                         = gMouseCursorBackground[ uiCurrentMouseBackbuffer ].usMouseXPos;
01020       usMouseYPos                         = gMouseCursorBackground[ uiCurrentMouseBackbuffer ].usMouseYPos;
01021 
01022       switch (uiDirection)
01023       {
01024             case SCROLL_LEFT:
01025 
01026                   Region.left = 0;
01027                   Region.top = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
01028                   Region.right = usWidth-(sScrollXIncrement);
01029                   Region.bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + usHeight;
01030 
01031                   do
01032                   {
01033                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pDest, sScrollXIncrement, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, pSource, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01034                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01035                         {
01036                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01037 
01038                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01039                               {
01040                                     break;
01041                               }
01042                         }
01043                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01044 
01045                   // memset z-buffer
01046                   for(uiCountY = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y; uiCountY++)
01047                   {
01048                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280), 0, 
01049                                                 sScrollXIncrement*2); 
01050 
01051                   }     
01052 
01053                   StripRegions[ 0 ].right =(INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_START_X+sScrollXIncrement);
01054                   usMouseXPos += sScrollXIncrement;
01055 
01056                   usNumStrips = 1;
01057                   break;
01058 
01059             case SCROLL_RIGHT:
01060 
01061 
01062                   Region.left = sScrollXIncrement ;
01063                   Region.top = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
01064                   Region.right = usWidth;
01065                   Region.bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + usHeight;
01066 
01067                   do
01068                   {
01069                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pDest, 0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, pSource, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01070                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01071                         {
01072                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01073 
01074                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01075                               {
01076                                     break;
01077                               }
01078                         }
01079                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01080 
01081                   // memset z-buffer
01082                   for(uiCountY= gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y; uiCountY++)
01083                   {
01084                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280) + ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - sScrollXIncrement ) * 2 ), 0, 
01085                                                 sScrollXIncrement*2); 
01086                   }     
01087 
01088 
01089                   //for(uiCountY=0; uiCountY < usHeight; uiCountY++)
01090                   //{
01091                   //    memcpy(pDestBuf+(uiCountY*uiDestPitchBYTES),
01092                   //                            pSrcBuf+(uiCountY*uiDestPitchBYTES)+sScrollXIncrement*uiBPP,
01093                   //                            uiDestPitchBYTES-sScrollXIncrement*uiBPP);
01094                   //}
01095 
01096                   StripRegions[ 0 ].left =(INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_END_X-sScrollXIncrement);
01097                   usMouseXPos -= sScrollXIncrement;
01098 
01099                   usNumStrips = 1;
01100                   break;
01101 
01102             case SCROLL_UP:
01103 
01104                   Region.left = 0;
01105                   Region.top = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
01106                   Region.right = usWidth;
01107                   Region.bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + usHeight - sScrollYIncrement;
01108 
01109                   do
01110                   {
01111                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pDest, 0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + sScrollYIncrement, pSource, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01112                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01113                         {
01114                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01115 
01116                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01117                               {
01118                                     break;
01119                               }
01120                         }
01121                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01122 
01123 
01124                   for(uiCountY=sScrollYIncrement-1+gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY >= gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY--)
01125                   {
01126                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280), 0, 
01127                                                 2280);
01128                   }     
01129 
01130                   //for(uiCountY=usHeight-1; uiCountY >= sScrollYIncrement; uiCountY--)
01131                   //{
01132                   //    memcpy(pDestBuf+(uiCountY*uiDestPitchBYTES),
01133                   //                            pSrcBuf+((uiCountY-sScrollYIncrement)*uiDestPitchBYTES),
01134                   //                            uiDestPitchBYTES);
01135                   //}
01136                   StripRegions[ 0 ].bottom =(INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y+sScrollYIncrement);
01137                   usNumStrips = 1;
01138 
01139                   usMouseYPos += sScrollYIncrement;
01140 
01141                   break;
01142 
01143             case SCROLL_DOWN:
01144 
01145                   Region.left = 0;
01146                   Region.top = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + sScrollYIncrement;
01147                   Region.right = usWidth;
01148                   Region.bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + usHeight;
01149 
01150                   do
01151                   {
01152                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pDest, 0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, pSource, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01153                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01154                         {
01155                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01156 
01157                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01158                               {
01159                                     break;
01160                               }
01161                         }
01162                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01163 
01164                   // Zero out z
01165                   for(uiCountY=(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y - sScrollYIncrement ); uiCountY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y; uiCountY++)
01166                   {
01167                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280), 0,
01168                                                 2280);
01169                   }
01170 
01171                   //for(uiCountY=0; uiCountY < (usHeight-sScrollYIncrement); uiCountY++)
01172                   //{
01173                   //    memcpy(pDestBuf+(uiCountY*uiDestPitchBYTES),
01174                   //                            pSrcBuf+((uiCountY+sScrollYIncrement)*uiDestPitchBYTES),
01175                   //                            uiDestPitchBYTES);
01176                   //}
01177 
01178                   StripRegions[ 0 ].top = (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y-sScrollYIncrement);
01179                   usNumStrips = 1;
01180 
01181                   usMouseYPos -= sScrollYIncrement;
01182 
01183                   break;
01184 
01185             case SCROLL_UPLEFT:
01186 
01187                   Region.left = 0;
01188                   Region.top = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
01189                   Region.right = usWidth-(sScrollXIncrement);
01190                   Region.bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + usHeight - sScrollYIncrement;
01191 
01192                   do
01193                   {
01194                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pDest, sScrollXIncrement, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + sScrollYIncrement, pSource, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01195                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01196                         {
01197                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01198 
01199                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01200                               {
01201                                     break;
01202                               }
01203                         }
01204                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01205 
01206                   // memset z-buffer
01207                   for(uiCountY=gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y; uiCountY++)
01208                   {
01209                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280), 0, 
01210                                                 sScrollXIncrement*2); 
01211 
01212                   }     
01213                   for(uiCountY=gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + sScrollYIncrement-1; uiCountY >= gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY--)
01214                   {
01215                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280), 0, 
01216                                                 2280);
01217                   }     
01218 
01219 
01220                   StripRegions[ 0 ].right =  (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_START_X+sScrollXIncrement);
01221                   StripRegions[ 1 ].bottom = (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y+sScrollYIncrement);
01222                   StripRegions[ 1 ].left   = (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_START_X+sScrollXIncrement);
01223                   usNumStrips = 2;
01224 
01225                   usMouseYPos += sScrollYIncrement;
01226                   usMouseXPos += sScrollXIncrement;
01227 
01228                   break;
01229 
01230             case SCROLL_UPRIGHT:
01231 
01232                   Region.left = sScrollXIncrement;
01233                   Region.top = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
01234                   Region.right = usWidth;
01235                   Region.bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + usHeight - sScrollYIncrement;
01236 
01237                   do
01238                   {
01239                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pDest, 0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + sScrollYIncrement, pSource, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01240                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01241                         {
01242                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01243 
01244                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01245                               {
01246                                     break;
01247                               }
01248                         }
01249                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01250 
01251                   // memset z-buffer
01252                   for(uiCountY=gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y; uiCountY++)
01253                   {
01254                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280) + ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - sScrollXIncrement ) * 2 ), 0, 
01255                                                 sScrollXIncrement*2); 
01256                   }     
01257                   for(uiCountY=gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + sScrollYIncrement-1; uiCountY >= gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY--)
01258                   {
01259                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280), 0, 
01260                                                 2280);
01261                   }     
01262 
01263 
01264                   StripRegions[ 0 ].left =   (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_END_X-sScrollXIncrement);
01265                   StripRegions[ 1 ].bottom = (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y+sScrollYIncrement);
01266                   StripRegions[ 1 ].right  = (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_END_X-sScrollXIncrement);
01267                   usNumStrips = 2;
01268 
01269                   usMouseYPos += sScrollYIncrement;
01270                   usMouseXPos -= sScrollXIncrement;
01271 
01272                   break;
01273 
01274             case SCROLL_DOWNLEFT:
01275 
01276                   Region.left = 0;
01277                   Region.top = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + sScrollYIncrement;
01278                   Region.right = usWidth-(sScrollXIncrement);
01279                   Region.bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + usHeight;
01280 
01281                   do
01282                   {
01283                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pDest, sScrollXIncrement, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, pSource, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01284                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01285                         {
01286                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01287 
01288                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01289                               {
01290                                     break;
01291                               }
01292                         }
01293                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01294 
01295                   // memset z-buffer
01296                   for(uiCountY=gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y; uiCountY++)
01297                   {
01298                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280), 0, 
01299                                                 sScrollXIncrement*2); 
01300 
01301                   }     
01302                   for(uiCountY=(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y - sScrollYIncrement); uiCountY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y; uiCountY++)
01303                   {
01304                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280), 0,
01305                                                 2280);
01306                   }
01307 
01308 
01309                   StripRegions[ 0 ].right =(INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_START_X+sScrollXIncrement);
01310 
01311 
01312                   StripRegions[ 1 ].top         = (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y-sScrollYIncrement);
01313                   StripRegions[ 1 ].left  = (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_START_X+sScrollXIncrement);
01314                   usNumStrips = 2;
01315 
01316                   usMouseYPos -= sScrollYIncrement;
01317                   usMouseXPos += sScrollXIncrement;
01318 
01319                   break;
01320 
01321             case SCROLL_DOWNRIGHT:
01322 
01323                   Region.left = sScrollXIncrement;
01324                   Region.top = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + sScrollYIncrement;
01325                   Region.right = usWidth;
01326                   Region.bottom = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y + usHeight;
01327 
01328                   do
01329                   {
01330                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pDest, 0, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y, pSource, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01331                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01332                         {
01333                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01334 
01335                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01336                               {
01337                                     break;
01338                               }
01339                         } 
01340                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01341 
01342                   // memset z-buffer
01343                   for(uiCountY=gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y; uiCountY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y; uiCountY++)
01344                   {
01345                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280) + ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - sScrollXIncrement ) * 2 ), 0, 
01346                                                 sScrollXIncrement*2); 
01347                   }     
01348                   for(uiCountY=(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y - sScrollYIncrement); uiCountY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y; uiCountY++)
01349                   {
01350                         memset((UINT8 *)gpZBuffer+(uiCountY*2280), 0,
01351                                                 2280);
01352                   }
01353 
01354 
01355                   StripRegions[ 0 ].left =(INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_END_X-sScrollXIncrement);
01356                   StripRegions[ 1 ].top = (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y-sScrollYIncrement);
01357                   StripRegions[ 1 ].right = (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_END_X-sScrollXIncrement);
01358                   usNumStrips = 2;
01359 
01360                   usMouseYPos -= sScrollYIncrement;
01361                   usMouseXPos -= sScrollXIncrement;
01362 
01363                   break;
01364 
01365       }
01366 
01367       if ( fRenderStrip )
01368       {
01369 
01370             // Memset to 0
01371 #ifdef SCROLL_TEST
01372             {
01373                   DDBLTFX                        BlitterFX;
01374             
01375                   BlitterFX.dwSize = sizeof( DDBLTFX );
01376                   BlitterFX.dwFillColor = 0;
01377 
01378                   DDBltSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pDest, NULL, NULL, NULL, DDBLT_COLORFILL, &BlitterFX );
01379             }
01380 #endif
01381 
01382 
01383             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < usNumStrips; cnt++ )
01384             {
01385                   //RenderStaticWorld();
01386                   //RenderDynamicWorld();
01387                   RenderStaticWorldRect( (INT16)StripRegions[ cnt ].left , (INT16)StripRegions[ cnt ].top , (INT16)StripRegions[ cnt ].right, (INT16)StripRegions[ cnt ].bottom , TRUE );
01388                   // Optimize Redundent tiles too!
01389                   //ExamineZBufferRect( (INT16)StripRegions[ cnt ].left, (INT16)StripRegions[ cnt ].top, (INT16)StripRegions[ cnt ].right, (INT16)StripRegions[ cnt ].bottom );
01390 
01391                   do
01392                   {
01393                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pDest, StripRegions[ cnt ].left, StripRegions[ cnt ].top, gpFrameBuffer, (LPRECT)&( StripRegions[ cnt ] ), DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01394                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01395                         {
01396                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01397                         }
01398 
01399                         if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01400                         {
01401                               break;
01402                         }
01403                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01404 
01405             }
01406 
01407             sShiftX = 0;
01408             sShiftY = 0;
01409 
01410             switch (uiDirection)
01411             {
01412                   case SCROLL_LEFT:
01413 
01414                         sShiftX = sScrollXIncrement;
01415                         sShiftY = 0;
01416                         break;
01417 
01418                   case SCROLL_RIGHT:
01419 
01420                         sShiftX = -sScrollXIncrement;
01421                         sShiftY = 0;
01422                         break;
01423 
01424                   case SCROLL_UP:
01425 
01426                         sShiftX = 0;
01427                         sShiftY = sScrollYIncrement;
01428                         break;
01429 
01430                   case SCROLL_DOWN:
01431 
01432                         sShiftX = 0;
01433                         sShiftY = -sScrollYIncrement;
01434                         break;
01435 
01436                   case SCROLL_UPLEFT:
01437 
01438                         sShiftX = sScrollXIncrement;
01439                         sShiftY = sScrollYIncrement;
01440                         break;
01441 
01442                   case SCROLL_UPRIGHT:
01443 
01444                         sShiftX = -sScrollXIncrement;
01445                         sShiftY = sScrollYIncrement;
01446                         break;
01447 
01448                   case SCROLL_DOWNLEFT:
01449 
01450                         sShiftX = sScrollXIncrement;
01451                         sShiftY = -sScrollYIncrement;
01452                         break;
01453 
01454                   case SCROLL_DOWNRIGHT:
01455 
01456                         sShiftX = -sScrollXIncrement;
01457                         sShiftY = -sScrollYIncrement;
01458                         break;
01459 
01460 
01461             }
01462 
01463             // RESTORE SHIFTED
01464             RestoreShiftedVideoOverlays( sShiftX, sShiftY );
01465 
01466             // SAVE NEW
01467             SaveVideoOverlaysArea( BACKBUFFER );
01468 
01469             // BLIT NEW
01470             ExecuteVideoOverlaysToAlternateBuffer( BACKBUFFER );
01471 
01472 
01473 #if 0
01474 
01475             // Erase mouse from old position
01476             if (gMouseCursorBackground[ uiCurrentMouseBackbuffer ].fRestore == TRUE )
01477             {
01478 
01479                   do
01480                   {
01481                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, usMouseXPos, usMouseYPos, gMouseCursorBackground[uiCurrentMouseBackbuffer].pSurface, (LPRECT)&MouseRegion, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01482                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01483                         {
01484                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01485 
01486                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01487                               {
01488 
01489                               }
01490                         }
01491                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01492             }
01493 
01494 #endif
01495 
01496       }
01497 
01498 
01499       //InvalidateRegion( sLeftDraw, sTopDraw, sRightDraw, sBottomDraw );
01500 
01501       //UpdateSaveBuffer();
01502       //SaveBackgroundRects();
01503 }           
01504 
01505 
01506 //rain
01507 //extern BOOLEAN gfVSync;
01508 
01509 BOOLEAN IsItAllowedToRenderRain();
01510 extern UINT32 guiRainRenderSurface;
01511 
01512 BOOLEAN gfNextRefreshFullScreen = FALSE;
01513 //end rain
01514 
01515 void RefreshScreen(void *DummyVariable)
01516 {
01517   static UINT32  uiRefreshThreadState, uiIndex;
01518   UINT16  usScreenWidth, usScreenHeight;
01519   static BOOLEAN fShowMouse;
01520   HRESULT ReturnCode;
01521   static RECT    Region;  
01522   static POINT   MousePos;
01523       static BOOLEAN fFirstTime = TRUE;
01524       UINT32                                    uiTime;
01525 
01526       usScreenWidth = usScreenHeight = 0;
01527 
01528       if ( fFirstTime )
01529       {
01530             fShowMouse = FALSE;
01531       }
01532 
01533       if( gfNextRefreshFullScreen )
01534       {
01535             if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
01536             {
01537                   InvalidateScreen();
01538                   gfRenderScroll = FALSE;
01539                   //                gfForceFullScreenRefresh = TRUE;
01540                   //                guiFrameBufferState == BUFFER_DIRTY;
01541             }
01542             gfNextRefreshFullScreen = FALSE;
01543       }
01544 
01545   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Looping in refresh");
01546 
01547   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01548   // 
01549   // REFRESH_THREAD_MUTEX 
01550   //
01551   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01552 
01553   switch (guiVideoManagerState)
01554   {
01555     case VIDEO_ON
01556     : //
01557       // Excellent, everything is cosher, we continue on
01558       //
01559       uiRefreshThreadState = guiRefreshThreadState = THREAD_ON;        
01560       usScreenWidth = gusScreenWidth;
01561       usScreenHeight = gusScreenHeight;
01562       break;
01563     case VIDEO_OFF
01564     : //
01565       // Hot damn, the video manager is suddenly off. We have to bugger out of here. Don't forget to
01566       // leave the critical section
01567       //
01568       guiRefreshThreadState = THREAD_OFF;
01569       return;
01570     case VIDEO_SUSPENDED
01571     : //
01572       // This are suspended. Make sure the refresh function does try to access any of the direct
01573       // draw surfaces
01574       //
01575       uiRefreshThreadState = guiRefreshThreadState = THREAD_SUSPENDED;
01576       break;
01577     case VIDEO_SHUTTING_DOWN
01578     : //
01579       // Well things are shutting down. So we need to bugger out of there. Don't forget to leave the
01580       // critical section before returning
01581       //
01582     guiRefreshThreadState = THREAD_OFF;
01583     return;
01584   }
01585 
01586 
01587   //
01588   // Get the current mouse position
01589   //
01590 
01591   GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
01592 
01593   /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01594   // 
01595   // FRAME_BUFFER_MUTEX 
01596   //
01597   /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01598 
01599 
01600       // RESTORE OLD POSITION OF MOUSE
01601       if (gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].fRestore == TRUE )
01602       {
01603             Region.left = gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usLeft;
01604             Region.top = gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usTop;
01605             Region.right = gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usRight;
01606             Region.bottom = gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usBottom;
01607 
01608             do
01609             {
01610                   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseXPos, gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseYPos, gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].pSurface, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01611                   if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01612                   {
01613                         DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01614 
01615                         if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01616                         {
01617                               goto ENDOFLOOP;
01618                         }
01619                   }
01620             } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01621 
01622             // Save position into other background region
01623             memcpy( &(gMouseCursorBackground[PREVIOUS_MOUSE_DATA] ), &(gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA] ), sizeof( MouseCursorBackground ) );
01624 
01625       }
01626 
01627 
01628   //
01629   // Ok we were able to get a hold of the frame buffer stuff. Check to see if it needs updating
01630   // if not, release the frame buffer stuff right away
01631   //
01632       if (guiFrameBufferState == BUFFER_DIRTY)
01633       {
01634             
01635             // Well the frame buffer is dirty.
01636             //
01637 
01638             if (gpFrameBufferRefreshOverride != NULL)
01639             {
01640                   //
01641                   // Method (3) - We are using a function override to refresh the frame buffer. First we
01642                   // call the override function then we must set the override pointer to NULL
01643                   //
01644     
01645                   (*gpFrameBufferRefreshOverride)();
01646                   gpFrameBufferRefreshOverride = NULL;
01647 
01648             }
01649 
01650 
01651             if ( gfFadeInitialized && gfFadeInVideo )
01652             {
01653                   gFadeFunction( );
01654             }
01655             else
01656             //
01657             // Either Method (1) or (2)
01658             //
01659             {
01660                   if (gfForceFullScreenRefresh == TRUE)
01661                   {
01662                         //
01663                         // Method (1) - We will be refreshing the entire screen
01664                         //
01665 
01666                         Region.left = 0;
01667                         Region.top = 0;
01668                         Region.right = usScreenWidth;
01669                         Region.bottom = usScreenHeight;
01670 
01671                         do
01672                         {
01673                               ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, 0, 0, gpFrameBuffer, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01674                               if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01675                               {
01676                                     DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01677 
01678                                     if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01679                                     {
01680                                           goto ENDOFLOOP;
01681                                     }
01682                               }
01683                         } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01684 
01685 
01686                   }
01687                   else
01688                   {
01689                         for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < guiDirtyRegionCount; uiIndex++)
01690                         {
01691                               Region.left   = gListOfDirtyRegions[uiIndex].iLeft;
01692                               Region.top    = gListOfDirtyRegions[uiIndex].iTop;
01693                               Region.right  = gListOfDirtyRegions[uiIndex].iRight;
01694                               Region.bottom = gListOfDirtyRegions[uiIndex].iBottom;
01695 
01696                               do
01697                               {
01698                                     ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, Region.left, Region.top, gpFrameBuffer, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01699                                     if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01700                                     {
01701                                           DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01702                                     }
01703 
01704                                     if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01705                                     {
01706                                           goto ENDOFLOOP;
01707                                     }
01708                               } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01709 
01710                         }
01711 
01712                         // Now do new, extended dirty regions
01713                         for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < guiDirtyRegionExCount; uiIndex++)
01714                         {
01715                               Region.left   = gDirtyRegionsEx[uiIndex].iLeft;
01716                               Region.top    = gDirtyRegionsEx[uiIndex].iTop;
01717                               Region.right  = gDirtyRegionsEx[uiIndex].iRight;
01718                               Region.bottom = gDirtyRegionsEx[uiIndex].iBottom;
01719 
01720                               // Do some checks if we are in the process of scrolling!    
01721                               if ( gfRenderScroll )
01722                               {
01723 
01724                                     // Check if we are completely out of bounds
01725                                     if ( Region.top <= gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y  && Region.bottom <= gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y )
01726                                     {
01727                                           continue;
01728                                     }
01729 
01730                               }
01731 
01732                               do
01733                               {
01734                                     ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, Region.left, Region.top, gpFrameBuffer, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01735                                     if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01736                                     {
01737                                           DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01738                                     }
01739 
01740                                     if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
01741                                     {
01742                                           goto ENDOFLOOP;
01743                                     }
01744                               } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01745 
01746                         }
01747 
01748                   }
01749                                     
01750             }
01751             if ( gfRenderScroll )
01752             {
01753                   ScrollJA2Background( guiScrollDirection, gsScrollXIncrement, gsScrollYIncrement, gpPrimarySurface, gpBackBuffer, TRUE, PREVIOUS_MOUSE_DATA );
01754             }
01755             gfIgnoreScrollDueToCenterAdjust = FALSE;
01756       
01757  
01758 
01759 
01760             //
01761             // Update the guiFrameBufferState variable to reflect that the frame buffer can now be handled
01762             //
01763 
01764             guiFrameBufferState = BUFFER_READY;
01765       }
01766 
01767   //
01768   // Do we want to print the frame stuff ??
01769   //
01770 
01771       if( gfVideoCapture )
01772       {
01773             uiTime=GetTickCount();
01774             if((uiTime < guiLastFrame) || (uiTime > (guiLastFrame+guiFramePeriod)))
01775             {
01776                   SnapshotSmall( );       
01777                   guiLastFrame=uiTime;
01778             }
01779       }
01780 
01781 
01782   if (gfPrintFrameBuffer == TRUE)
01783   {
01784     LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE    _pTmpBuffer;
01785     LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2   pTmpBuffer;
01786     DDSURFACEDESC          SurfaceDescription;
01787     FILE                  *OutputFile;
01788     UINT8                  FileName[64];
01789     INT32                  iIndex;
01790             STRING512               DataDir;
01791             STRING512                        ExecDir;
01792     UINT16                 *p16BPPData;
01793 
01794             // Snap: save current directory
01795             GetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
01796             GetExecutableDirectory( ExecDir );
01797             SetFileManCurrentDirectory( ExecDir );
01798 
01799     //
01800     // Create temporary system memory surface. This is used to correct problems with the backbuffer
01801     // surface which can be interlaced or have a funky pitch
01802     //
01803 
01804     ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
01805     SurfaceDescription.dwSize         = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
01806     SurfaceDescription.dwFlags        = DDSD_CAPS | DDSD_WIDTH | DDSD_HEIGHT;
01807     SurfaceDescription.ddsCaps.dwCaps = DDSCAPS_OFFSCREENPLAIN | DDSCAPS_SYSTEMMEMORY;
01808     SurfaceDescription.dwWidth        = SCREEN_WIDTH;
01809     SurfaceDescription.dwHeight       = SCREEN_HEIGHT;
01810     ReturnCode = IDirectDraw2_CreateSurface ( gpDirectDrawObject, &SurfaceDescription, &_pTmpBuffer, NULL );
01811             if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01812     { 
01813       DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01814     }
01815 
01816     ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface_QueryInterface(_pTmpBuffer, /*&*/IID_IDirectDrawSurface2, (LPVOID *)&pTmpBuffer); // (jonathanl)
01817             if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01818     { 
01819       DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01820     }
01821     
01822     //
01823     // Copy the primary surface to the temporary surface
01824     //
01825 
01826     Region.left = 0;
01827     Region.top = 0;
01828     Region.right = SCREEN_WIDTH;
01829     Region.bottom = SCREEN_HEIGHT;
01830 
01831     do
01832     {            
01833       ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(pTmpBuffer, 0, 0, gpPrimarySurface, &Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01834               if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01835       {
01836         DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01837       }
01838     } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01839 
01840     //
01841     // Ok now that temp surface has contents of backbuffer, copy temp surface to disk
01842     //
01843 
01844       do
01845       {
01846             sprintf((char *) FileName, "SCREEN%03d.TGA", guiPrintFrameBufferIndex++);
01847       }
01848       while( (_access( (const char *)FileName, 0 )) != -1 );
01849 
01850     if ((OutputFile = fopen((const char *) FileName, "wb")) != NULL)
01851     {
01852       fprintf(OutputFile, "%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c%c", 0, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, LOBYTE(SCREEN_WIDTH), HIBYTE(SCREEN_WIDTH), LOBYTE(SCREEN_HEIGHT), HIBYTE(SCREEN_HEIGHT), 0x10, 0);
01853 
01854 
01855       //
01856       // Lock temp surface
01857       //
01858 
01859       ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
01860           SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
01861       ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Lock(pTmpBuffer, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
01862                   if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01863       {
01864         DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01865       }
01866 
01867       //
01868       // Copy 16 bit buffer to file
01869       //
01870 
01871       // 5/6/5.. create buffer...
01872                   if (gusRedMask == 0xF800 && gusGreenMask == 0x07E0 && gusBlueMask == 0x001F)
01873       {
01874         p16BPPData = (UINT16 *)MemAlloc( SCREEN_WIDTH * 2 );
01875       }
01876 
01877       for (iIndex = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1; iIndex >= 0; iIndex--)
01878       { 
01879         // ATE: OK, fix this such that it converts pixel format to 5/5/5
01880         // if current settings are 5/6/5....
01881                         if (gusRedMask == 0xF800 && gusGreenMask == 0x07E0 && gusBlueMask == 0x001F)
01882         {
01883           // Read into a buffer...
01884           memcpy( p16BPPData, ( ((UINT8 *)SurfaceDescription.lpSurface) + (iIndex * SCREEN_WIDTH * 2) ), SCREEN_WIDTH * 2 ); 
01885 
01886           // Convert....
01887           ConvertRGBDistribution565To555( p16BPPData, SCREEN_WIDTH );
01888 
01889           // Write
01890           fwrite( p16BPPData, SCREEN_WIDTH * 2, 1, OutputFile);
01891         }
01892         else
01893         {
01894           fwrite((void *)(((UINT8 *)SurfaceDescription.lpSurface) + (iIndex * SCREEN_WIDTH * 2)), SCREEN_WIDTH * 2, 1, OutputFile);
01895         }
01896       }
01897 
01898       // 5/6/5.. Delete buffer...
01899                   if (gusRedMask == 0xF800 && gusGreenMask == 0x07E0 && gusBlueMask == 0x001F)
01900       {
01901         MemFree( p16BPPData );
01902       }
01903       
01904       fclose(OutputFile);
01905 
01906       //
01907       // Unlock temp surface
01908       //
01909 
01910       ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
01911       SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
01912       ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Unlock(pTmpBuffer, &SurfaceDescription);
01913                   if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01914       {
01915         DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );    
01916       }
01917     }
01918 
01919     //
01920     // Release temp surface
01921     //
01922 
01923     gfPrintFrameBuffer = FALSE;          
01924     IDirectDrawSurface2_Release(pTmpBuffer);  
01925 
01926             // Snap: Restore the data directory once we are finished.
01927             SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
01928             //strcat( ExecDir, "\\Data" );
01929             //SetFileManCurrentDirectory( ExecDir );
01930   }
01931 
01932   //
01933   // Ok we were able to get a hold of the frame buffer stuff. Check to see if it needs updating
01934   // if not, release the frame buffer stuff right away
01935   //
01936 
01937   if (guiMouseBufferState == BUFFER_DIRTY)
01938   {
01939     //
01940     // Well the mouse buffer is dirty. Upload the whole thing
01941     //
01942 
01943     Region.left = 0;
01944     Region.top = 0;
01945     Region.right = gusMouseCursorWidth;
01946     Region.bottom = gusMouseCursorHeight;
01947 
01948     do
01949     {
01950       ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpMouseCursor, 0, 0, gpMouseCursorOriginal, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
01951               if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
01952       {
01953         DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01954       }
01955     } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
01956 
01957     guiMouseBufferState = BUFFER_READY;
01958   }
01959   
01960   //
01961   // Check current state of the mouse cursor
01962   //
01963 
01964   if (fShowMouse == FALSE)
01965   {
01966     if (guiMouseBufferState == BUFFER_READY)
01967     {
01968       fShowMouse = TRUE;             
01969     }
01970     else
01971     {
01972       fShowMouse = FALSE;
01973     }
01974   }
01975   else
01976   {
01977     if (guiMouseBufferState == BUFFER_DISABLED)
01978     {
01979       fShowMouse = FALSE;
01980     }
01981   }
01982 
01983   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01984   // 
01985   // End of MOUSE_BUFFER_MUTEX
01986   //
01987   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01988 
01989 
01990   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01991   // 
01992   // If fMouseState == TRUE
01993   //
01994   // (1) Save mouse background from gpBackBuffer to gpMouseCursorBackground
01995   // (2) If step (1) is successfull blit mouse cursor onto gpBackBuffer
01996   //
01997   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01998 
01999   if (fShowMouse == TRUE )
02000   {      
02001     //
02002     // Step (1) - Save mouse background
02003     //                      
02004 
02005     Region.left   = MousePos.x - gsMouseCursorXOffset;
02006     Region.top    = MousePos.y - gsMouseCursorYOffset;
02007     Region.right  = Region.left + gusMouseCursorWidth;
02008     Region.bottom = Region.top + gusMouseCursorHeight;        
02009 
02010     if (Region.right > usScreenWidth)
02011     {
02012       Region.right = usScreenWidth;          
02013     }
02014 
02015     if (Region.bottom > usScreenHeight)
02016     {
02017       Region.bottom = usScreenHeight;
02018     }        
02019 
02020     if ((Region.right > Region.left)&&(Region.bottom > Region.top))
02021     {
02022       //
02023       // Make sure the mouse background is marked for restore and coordinates are saved for the
02024       // future restore
02025       //
02026 
02027       gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].fRestore    = TRUE;                    
02028       gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usRight     = (UINT16) Region.right - (UINT16) Region.left;
02029       gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usBottom    = (UINT16) Region.bottom - (UINT16) Region.top;
02030       if (Region.left < 0)
02031       {
02032         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usLeft = (UINT16) (0 - Region.left);
02033         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseXPos = 0;
02034         Region.left = 0;
02035       }
02036       else
02037       {
02038         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseXPos = (UINT16) MousePos.x - gsMouseCursorXOffset;
02039         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usLeft = 0;
02040       }
02041       if (Region.top < 0)
02042       {
02043         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseYPos = 0;
02044         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usTop = (UINT16) (0 - Region.top);
02045         Region.top = 0;
02046       }
02047       else
02048       {
02049         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseYPos = (UINT16) MousePos.y - gsMouseCursorYOffset;
02050         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usTop = 0;
02051       }          
02052 
02053                   if ((Region.right > Region.left)&&(Region.bottom > Region.top))
02054                   {
02055                         // Save clipped region
02056                         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].Region = Region;
02057 
02058                         //
02059                         // Ok, do the actual data save to the mouse background
02060                         //
02061 
02062                         do
02063                         {
02064                               ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].pSurface, gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usLeft, gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usTop, gpBackBuffer, &Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
02065                               if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02066                               {
02067                                     DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02068                               }
02069 
02070                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02071                               {
02072                                     goto ENDOFLOOP;
02073                               }
02074                         } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02075 
02076                         //
02077                         // Step (2) - Blit mouse cursor to back buffer
02078                         //
02079 
02080                         Region.left = gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usLeft;
02081                         Region.top = gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usTop;
02082                         Region.right = gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usRight;
02083                         Region.bottom = gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usBottom;
02084 
02085                         do
02086                         {            
02087                               ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseXPos, gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseYPos, gpMouseCursor, &Region, DDBLTFAST_SRCCOLORKEY);
02088                               if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02089                               {
02090                                     DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02091                               }
02092         
02093                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02094                               {
02095                                     goto ENDOFLOOP;
02096                               }
02097                         } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02098                   }
02099                   else
02100                   {
02101             //
02102                         // Hum, the mouse was not blitted this round. Henceforth we will flag fRestore as FALSE
02103                         //
02104 
02105                         gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].fRestore = FALSE;
02106                   }
02107 
02108     }
02109     else
02110     {
02111       //
02112       // Hum, the mouse was not blitted this round. Henceforth we will flag fRestore as FALSE
02113       //
02114 
02115       gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].fRestore = FALSE;
02116 
02117     }
02118   }
02119   else
02120   {
02121     //
02122     // Well since there was no mouse handling this round, we disable the mouse restore
02123     //        
02124 
02125     gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].fRestore = FALSE;
02126 
02127   }
02128 
02129 
02130 
02131   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02132   // Rain                                                                                      //
02133   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02134 
02135   if( IsItAllowedToRenderRain() && gfProgramIsRunning )
02136   {
02137         BltVideoSurface( BACKBUFFER, guiRainRenderSurface, 0, 0, 0, VS_BLT_FAST | VS_BLT_USECOLORKEY, NULL );
02138         gfNextRefreshFullScreen = TRUE;
02139   }
02140 
02141 
02142 
02143   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02144   // 
02145   // (1) Flip Pages
02146   // (2) If the page flipping worked, then we copy the contents of the primary surface back
02147   //     to the backbuffer
02148   // (3) If step (2) was successfull we then restore the mouse background onto the backbuffer
02149   //     if fShowMouse is TRUE
02150   //
02151   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02152 
02153   //
02154   // Step (1) - Flip pages
02155   //
02156 #ifdef WINDOWED_MODE
02157 
02158   do
02159   {
02160 
02161         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface_Blt(
02162                     gpPrimarySurface,          // dest surface
02163                     &rcWindow,              // dest rect
02164                     gpBackBuffer,           // src surface
02165                     NULL,                   // src rect (all of it)
02166                     DDBLT_WAIT,
02167                     NULL);
02168 
02169             if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02170     {
02171       DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02172 
02173       if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02174       {
02175         goto ENDOFLOOP;
02176       }
02177     }
02178 
02179   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02180 
02181 
02182 #else
02183 
02184   do
02185   {
02186         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface_Flip(_gpPrimarySurface, NULL, gGameExternalOptions.gfVSync ? DDFLIP_WAIT : 0x00000008l );//DDFLIP_WAIT ); 
02187 //    if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02188             if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02189     {
02190       DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02191 
02192       if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02193       {
02194         goto ENDOFLOOP;
02195       }
02196     }
02197 
02198   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02199 
02200 #endif
02201 
02202   //
02203   // Step (2) - Copy Primary Surface to the Back Buffer
02204   //
02205       if ( gfRenderScroll )
02206       {
02207             Region.left = 0;
02208             Region.top = 0;
02209             Region.right = gsVIEWPORT_END_X; //ods1 640;
02210             Region.bottom = gsVIEWPORT_END_Y;
02211 
02212 
02213             do
02214             {
02215                   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, 0, 0, gpPrimarySurface, &Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
02216                   if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02217                   {
02218                         DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02219 
02220                         if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02221                         {
02222                               goto ENDOFLOOP;
02223                         }
02224 
02225                   }
02226             } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02227 
02228             //Get new background for mouse
02229     //
02230     // Ok, do the actual data save to the mouse background
02231 
02232     //
02233 
02234 
02235             gfRenderScroll = FALSE;
02236             gfScrollStart  = FALSE;
02237 
02238       }
02239 
02240 
02241       // COPY MOUSE AREAS FROM PRIMARY BACK!
02242 
02243       // FIRST OLD ERASED POSITION
02244       if (gMouseCursorBackground[PREVIOUS_MOUSE_DATA].fRestore == TRUE )
02245       {
02246             Region =    gMouseCursorBackground[PREVIOUS_MOUSE_DATA].Region;
02247 
02248             do
02249             {
02250                   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, gMouseCursorBackground[PREVIOUS_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseXPos, gMouseCursorBackground[PREVIOUS_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseYPos, gpPrimarySurface, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
02251                   if (ReturnCode != DD_OK && ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING )
02252                   {
02253                         DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02254 
02255                         if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02256                         {
02257                               goto ENDOFLOOP;
02258                         }
02259                   }
02260             } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02261       }
02262 
02263       // NOW NEW MOUSE AREA
02264       if (gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].fRestore == TRUE )
02265       {
02266             Region =    gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].Region;
02267 
02268             
02269             do
02270             {
02271                   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseXPos, gMouseCursorBackground[CURRENT_MOUSE_DATA].usMouseYPos, gpPrimarySurface, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
02272                   if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02273                   {
02274                         DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02275 
02276                         if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02277                         {
02278                               goto ENDOFLOOP;
02279                         }
02280                   }
02281             } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02282       }
02283 
02284       if (gfForceFullScreenRefresh == TRUE )
02285       {
02286                   //
02287                   // Method (1) - We will be refreshing the entire screen
02288                   //
02289                   Region.left = 0;
02290                   Region.top = 0;
02291                   Region.right = SCREEN_WIDTH;
02292                   Region.bottom = SCREEN_HEIGHT;
02293 
02294 
02295                   do
02296                   {
02297                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, 0, 0, gpPrimarySurface, &Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
02298                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02299                         {
02300                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02301 
02302                               if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02303                               {
02304                                     goto ENDOFLOOP;
02305                               }
02306 
02307                         }
02308                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02309 
02310                   guiDirtyRegionCount = 0; 
02311                   guiDirtyRegionExCount = 0; 
02312                   gfForceFullScreenRefresh = FALSE;
02313       }
02314       else
02315       {
02316             for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < guiDirtyRegionCount; uiIndex++)
02317             {
02318                   Region.left   = gListOfDirtyRegions[uiIndex].iLeft;
02319                   Region.top    = gListOfDirtyRegions[uiIndex].iTop;
02320                   Region.right  = gListOfDirtyRegions[uiIndex].iRight;
02321                   Region.bottom = gListOfDirtyRegions[uiIndex].iBottom;
02322 
02323                   do
02324                   {
02325                         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, Region.left, Region.top, gpPrimarySurface, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
02326                         if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02327                         {
02328                               DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02329                         }
02330 
02331                         if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02332                         {
02333                               goto ENDOFLOOP;
02334                         }
02335                   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02336             }
02337 
02338             guiDirtyRegionCount = 0;
02339             gfForceFullScreenRefresh = FALSE;
02340 
02341       }
02342 
02343       // Do extended dirty regions!
02344       for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < guiDirtyRegionExCount; uiIndex++)
02345       {
02346             Region.left   = gDirtyRegionsEx[uiIndex].iLeft;
02347             Region.top    = gDirtyRegionsEx[uiIndex].iTop;
02348             Region.right  = gDirtyRegionsEx[uiIndex].iRight;
02349             Region.bottom = gDirtyRegionsEx[uiIndex].iBottom;
02350 
02351             if ( ( Region.top < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y ) && gfRenderScroll )
02352             {
02353                   continue;
02354             }
02355 
02356             do
02357             {
02358                   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(gpBackBuffer, Region.left, Region.top, gpPrimarySurface, (LPRECT)&Region, DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY);
02359                   if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02360                   {
02361                         DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02362                   }
02363 
02364                   if (ReturnCode == DDERR_SURFACELOST)
02365                   {
02366                         goto ENDOFLOOP;
02367                   }
02368             } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02369       }
02370 
02371       guiDirtyRegionExCount = 0;
02372 
02373 
02374 ENDOFLOOP:
02375       
02376 
02377       fFirstTime = FALSE;
02378 
02379 }
02380

02392 }

02430 
02431 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02432 //
02433 // Buffer access functions   
02434 //
02435 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02436 
02437 PTR LockPrimarySurface(UINT32 *uiPitch)
02438 {
02439   HRESULT       ReturnCode;
02440   DDSURFACEDESC SurfaceDescription;
02441 
02442 
02443   ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
02444       SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
02445 
02446   do
02447   {
02448         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Lock(gpPrimarySurface, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
02449     if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02450     {
02451       DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Failed to lock backbuffer");
02452       DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02453       return NULL;
02454     }
02455 
02456   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02457 
02458   *uiPitch = SurfaceDescription.lPitch;
02459   return SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
02460 }
02461 
02462 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02463 
02464 void UnlockPrimarySurface(void)
02465 {
02466   DDSURFACEDESC SurfaceDescription;
02467   HRESULT       ReturnCode;
02468 
02469   ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
02470   SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
02471   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Unlock(gpPrimarySurface, &SurfaceDescription);
02472       if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02473   {
02474     DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );    
02475   }
02476 }
02477 
02478 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02479 
02480 PTR LockBackBuffer(UINT32 *uiPitch)
02481 {
02482   HRESULT       ReturnCode;
02483   DDSURFACEDESC SurfaceDescription;
02484 
02485   //
02486   // W A R N I N G ---- W A R N I N G ---- W A R N I N G ---- W A R N I N G ---- W A R N I N G ----
02487   //
02488   // This function is intended to be called by a thread which has already locked the
02489   // FRAME_BUFFER_MUTEX mutual exclusion section. Anything else will cause the application to
02490   // yack
02491   //
02492 
02493   ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
02494       SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
02495 
02496   do
02497   {
02498     ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Lock(gpBackBuffer, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
02499     if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02500     {
02501       DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Failed to lock backbuffer");
02502       DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02503       return NULL;
02504     }
02505 
02506   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02507 
02508   *uiPitch = SurfaceDescription.lPitch;
02509   return SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
02510 }
02511 
02512 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02513 
02514 void UnlockBackBuffer(void)
02515 {
02516   DDSURFACEDESC SurfaceDescription;
02517   HRESULT       ReturnCode;
02518 
02519   //
02520   // W A R N I N G ---- W A R N I N G ---- W A R N I N G ---- W A R N I N G ---- W A R N I N G ----
02521   //
02522   // This function is intended to be called by a thread which has already locked the
02523   // FRAME_BUFFER_MUTEX mutual exclusion section. Anything else will cause the application to
02524   // yack
02525   //
02526 
02527   ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
02528   SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
02529   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Unlock(gpBackBuffer, &SurfaceDescription);
02530       if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02531   {
02532     DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );    
02533   }
02534 }
02535 
02536 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02537 
02538 PTR LockFrameBuffer(UINT32 *uiPitch)
02539 {
02540   HRESULT       ReturnCode;
02541   DDSURFACEDESC SurfaceDescription;
02542 
02543 
02544   ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
02545       SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
02546 
02547   do
02548   {
02549         ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Lock(gpFrameBuffer, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
02550     if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02551     {
02552       DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Failed to lock backbuffer");
02553       DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02554       return NULL;
02555     }
02556 
02557 
02558   } while (ReturnCode != DD_OK);
02559 
02560   *uiPitch = SurfaceDescription.lPitch;
02561 
02562   return SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
02563 }

02588 
02589 
02590   ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
02591       SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);

02593       if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02594   {

02596     return NULL;
02597   }
02598 
02599   *uiPitch = SurfaceDescription.lPitch;
02600   
02601   return SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
02602 }

02614       if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
02615   {

02617   }
02618 }
02619 
02620 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02621 //
02622 // RGB color management functions   
02623 //
02624 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02625 
02626 BOOLEAN GetRGBDistribution(void)
02627 {
02628 DDSURFACEDESC SurfaceDescription;
02629 UINT16        usBit;
02630 HRESULT       ReturnCode;
02631 
02632   Assert ( gpPrimarySurface != NULL );
02633 
02634       // ONLY DO IF WE ARE IN 16BIT MODE
02635       if ( gbPixelDepth == 8 )
02636       {
02637             return( TRUE );
02638       }
02639 
02640   ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
02641   SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof (DDSURFACEDESC);
02642   SurfaceDescription.dwFlags = DDSD_PIXELFORMAT;
02643   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_GetSurfaceDesc ( gpPrimarySurface, &SurfaceDescription );
02644   if (ReturnCode != DD_OK)
02645   {
02646     DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
02647     return FALSE;
02648   }
02649   
02650   //
02651   // Ok we now have the surface description, we now can get the information that we need
02652   //
02653 
02654       gusRedMask   = (UINT16) SurfaceDescription.ddpfPixelFormat.dwRBitMask;
02655       gusGreenMask = (UINT16) SurfaceDescription.ddpfPixelFormat.dwGBitMask;
02656       gusBlueMask  = (UINT16) SurfaceDescription.ddpfPixelFormat.dwBBitMask;
02657 
02658 
02659       // RGB 5,5,5
02660       if((gusRedMask==0x7c00) && (gusGreenMask==0x03e0) && (gusBlueMask==0x1f))
02661             guiTranslucentMask=0x3def;
02662       // RGB 5,6,5
02663       else// if((gusRedMask==0xf800) && (gusGreenMask==0x03e0) && (gusBlueMask==0x1f))
02664             guiTranslucentMask=0x7bef;
02665 
02666 
02667   usBit = 0x8000;
02668   gusRedShift = 8;
02669       while(!(gusRedMask & usBit))
02670       {
02671             usBit >>= 1;
02672             gusRedShift--;
02673       }
02674 
02675   usBit = 0x8000;
02676   gusGreenShift = 8;
02677       while(!(gusGreenMask & usBit))
02678       {
02679             usBit >>= 1;
02680             gusGreenShift--;
02681       }
02682 
02683   usBit = 0x8000;
02684   gusBlueShift = 8;
02685       while(!(gusBlueMask & usBit))
02686       {
02687             usBit >>= 1;
02688             gusBlueShift--;
02689       }
02690 
02691   return TRUE;
02692 }
02693

02696 BOOLEAN GetPrimaryRGBDistributionMasks(UINT32 *RedBitMask, UINT32 *GreenBitMask, UINT32 *BlueBitMask)
02697 {
02698       *RedBitMask   = gusRedMask;
02699       *GreenBitMask = gusGreenMask;
02700       *BlueBitMask  = gusBlueMask;
02701 
02702       return TRUE;
02703 }

02707 BOOLEAN SetMouseCursorFromObject(UINT32 uiVideoObjectHandle, UINT16 usVideoObjectSubIndex, UINT16 usOffsetX, UINT16 usOffsetY )
02708 {
02709   BOOLEAN      ReturnValue;
02710   PTR          pTmpPointer;
02711   UINT32       uiPitch;
02712   ETRLEObject  pETRLEPointer;
02713 
02714   //
02715   // Erase cursor background
02716   //
02717 
02718   pTmpPointer = LockMouseBuffer(&uiPitch);
02719   memset(pTmpPointer, 0, MAX_CURSOR_HEIGHT * uiPitch);
02720   UnlockMouseBuffer();
02721 
02722   //
02723   // Get new cursor data
02724   //
02725 
02726   ReturnValue = BltVideoObjectFromIndex(MOUSE_BUFFER, uiVideoObjectHandle, usVideoObjectSubIndex, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL);
02727   guiMouseBufferState = BUFFER_DIRTY;
02728 
02729   if (GetVideoObjectETRLEPropertiesFromIndex(uiVideoObjectHandle, &pETRLEPointer, usVideoObjectSubIndex))
02730   {
02731     gsMouseCursorXOffset = usOffsetX;
02732     gsMouseCursorYOffset = usOffsetY;
02733     gusMouseCursorWidth = pETRLEPointer.usWidth + pETRLEPointer.sOffsetX;
02734     gusMouseCursorHeight = pETRLEPointer.usHeight + pETRLEPointer.sOffsetY;
02735 
02736     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "=================================================");
02737     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Mouse Create with [ %d. %d ] [ %d, %d]", pETRLEPointer.sOffsetX, pETRLEPointer.sOffsetY, pETRLEPointer.usWidth, pETRLEPointer.usHeight));
02738     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "=================================================");
02739 
02740   }
02741   else
02742   {
02743     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Failed to get mouse info");
02744   }
02745 
02746   return ReturnValue;
02747 }

02760   UnlockMouseBuffer();
02761 
02762       // Don't set dirty
02763       return( TRUE );

02810 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02811 
02812 BOOLEAN LoadCursorFile(PTR pFilename)
02813 {
02814   VOBJECT_DESC VideoObjectDescription;
02815 
02816   //
02817   // Make sure the old cursor store is destroyed
02818   //
02819 
02820   if (gpCursorStore != NULL)
02821   {
02822     DeleteVideoObject(gpCursorStore);
02823     gpCursorStore = NULL;
02824   }
02825 
02826   //
02827   // Get the source file with all the cursors inside
02828   //
02829 
02830   VideoObjectDescription.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02831       strcpy(VideoObjectDescription.ImageFile, pFilename);
02832   gpCursorStore = CreateVideoObject(&VideoObjectDescription);
02833 
02834   //
02835   // Were we successful in creating the cursor store ? 
02836   //
02837 
02838   if (gpCursorStore == NULL)
02839   {
02840     return FALSE;
02841   }
02842 
02843   return TRUE;
02844 }

02846 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02847 
02848 BOOLEAN SetCurrentCursor(UINT16 usVideoObjectSubIndex,  UINT16 usOffsetX, UINT16 usOffsetY )
02849 {
02850   BOOLEAN      ReturnValue;
02851   PTR          pTmpPointer;
02852   UINT32       uiPitch;
02853   ETRLEObject  pETRLEPointer;
02854 
02855   //
02856   // Make sure we have a cursor store
02857   //
02858 
02859   if (gpCursorStore == NULL)
02860   {
02861     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "ERROR : Cursor store is not loaded");
02862     return FALSE;
02863   }
02864 
02865   //
02866   // Ok, then blit the mouse cursor to the MOUSE_BUFFER (which is really gpMouseBufferOriginal)
02867   //
02868   //
02869   // Erase cursor background
02870   //
02871 
02872   pTmpPointer = LockMouseBuffer(&uiPitch);
02873   memset(pTmpPointer, 0, MAX_CURSOR_HEIGHT * uiPitch);
02874   UnlockMouseBuffer();
02875 
02876   //
02877   // Get new cursor data
02878   //
02879 
02880   ReturnValue = BltVideoObject(MOUSE_BUFFER, gpCursorStore, usVideoObjectSubIndex, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL);
02881   guiMouseBufferState = BUFFER_DIRTY;
02882 
02883   if (GetVideoObjectETRLEProperties(gpCursorStore, &pETRLEPointer, usVideoObjectSubIndex))
02884   {
02885     gsMouseCursorXOffset = usOffsetX;
02886     gsMouseCursorYOffset = usOffsetY;
02887     gusMouseCursorWidth = pETRLEPointer.usWidth + pETRLEPointer.sOffsetX;
02888     gusMouseCursorHeight = pETRLEPointer.usHeight + pETRLEPointer.sOffsetY;
02889 
02890     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "=================================================");
02891     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Mouse Create with [ %d. %d ] [ %d, %d]", pETRLEPointer.sOffsetX, pETRLEPointer.sOffsetY, pETRLEPointer.usWidth, pETRLEPointer.usHeight));
02892     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "=================================================");
02893   }
02894   else
02895   {
02896     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Failed to get mouse info");
02897   }
02898 
02899   return ReturnValue;
02900 }

02927 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02928 BOOLEAN Set8BPPPalette(SGPPaletteEntry *pPalette)
02929 {
02930 HRESULT       ReturnCode;
02931 
02932   // If we are in 256 colors, then we have to initialize the palette system to 0 (faded out)
02933   memcpy(gSgpPalette, pPalette, sizeof(SGPPaletteEntry)*256);
02934 
02935   ReturnCode = IDirectDraw_CreatePalette(gpDirectDrawObject, (DDPCAPS_8BIT | DDPCAPS_ALLOW256), (LPPALETTEENTRY)(&gSgpPalette[0]), &gpDirectDrawPalette, NULL);
02936   if (ReturnCode != DD_OK)
02937   {
02938     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Failed to create palette (Rc = %d)", ReturnCode)); 
02939         return(FALSE);
02940   }
02941   // Apply the palette to the surfaces
02942   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface_SetPalette(gpPrimarySurface, gpDirectDrawPalette);
02943   if (ReturnCode != DD_OK)
02944   {
02945     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Failed to apply 8-bit palette to primary surface")); 
02946         return(FALSE);
02947   }
02948       
02949       ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface_SetPalette(gpBackBuffer, gpDirectDrawPalette);
02950   if (ReturnCode != DD_OK)
02951   {
02952     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Failed to apply 8-bit palette to back buffer")); 
02953         return(FALSE);
02954   }
02955   
02956       ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface_SetPalette(gpFrameBuffer, gpDirectDrawPalette);
02957   if (ReturnCode != DD_OK)
02958   {
02959     DebugMsg(TOPIC_VIDEO, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Failed to apply 8-bit palette to frame buffer")); 
02960         return(FALSE);
02961   }
02962 
02963       return(TRUE);
02964 }

02966 // template void FatalError<char const *>(char *, ...);
02967 template void FatalError<char const *>(char const *, ...);
02968 template <typename string1>
02969 void FatalError( string1 pError, ...)
02970 {
02971       va_list argptr;
02972 
02973       va_start(argptr, pError);           // Set up variable argument pointer
02974       vsprintf(gFatalErrorString, pError, argptr);    
02975       va_end(argptr);
02976 
02977 
02978       gfFatalError = TRUE;
02979 
02980       // Release DDraw
02981       IDirectDraw2_RestoreDisplayMode( gpDirectDrawObject );
02982   IDirectDraw2_Release( gpDirectDrawObject );
02983       ShowWindow( ghWindow, SW_HIDE );
02984 
02985   // destroy the window
02986   // DestroyWindow( ghWindow );
02987 
02988       gfProgramIsRunning = FALSE;
02989 
02990       MessageBox( ghWindow, gFatalErrorString, "JA2 Fatal Error", MB_OK | MB_TASKMODAL );
02991 
02992 }

02994 
02995 /*********************************************************************************
02996 * SnapshotSmall
02997 *
02998 *           Grabs a screen from the [rimary surface, and stuffs it into a 16-bit (RGB 5,5,5), 
02999 * uncompressed Targa file. Each time the routine is called, it increments the 
03000 * file number by one. The files are create in the current directory, usually the
03001 * EXE directory. This routine produces 1/4 sized images.
03002 *
03003 *********************************************************************************/
03004 
03005 #pragma pack (push, 1)
03006 
03007 typedef struct {
03008 
03009             UINT8       ubIDLength;
03010             UINT8       ubColorMapType;
03011             UINT8       ubTargaType;
03012             UINT16      usColorMapOrigin;
03013             UINT16      usColorMapLength;
03014             UINT8       ubColorMapEntrySize;
03015             UINT16      usOriginX;
03016             UINT16      usOriginY;
03017             UINT16      usImageWidth;
03018             UINT16      usImageHeight;
03019             UINT8       ubBitsPerPixel;
03020             UINT8       ubImageDescriptor;
03021             
03022 } TARGA_HEADER;
03023 
03024 #pragma pack (pop)
03025 
03026 
03027 void SnapshotSmall(void)
03028 {
03029       INT32 iCountX, iCountY;
03030   DDSURFACEDESC SurfaceDescription;
03031       UINT16 *pVideo, *pDest;
03032 
03033   HRESULT       ReturnCode;
03034 
03035 
03036   ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
03037       SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
03038   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Lock( gpPrimarySurface, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
03039       if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
03040   {
03041             return;
03042   }
03043 
03044 //    sprintf( cFilename, "JA%5.5d.TGA", uiPicNum++ );
03045       
03046 //    if( ( disk = fopen(cFilename, "wb"))==NULL )
03047 //          return;
03048 
03049 //    memset(&Header, 0, sizeof(TARGA_HEADER));
03050       
03051 //    Header.ubTargaType=2;               // Uncompressed 16/24/32 bit
03052 //    Header.usImageWidth=320;
03053 //    Header.usImageHeight=240;
03054 //    Header.ubBitsPerPixel=16;
03055 
03056 //    fwrite(&Header, sizeof(TARGA_HEADER), 1, disk);
03057 
03058             // Get the write pointer
03059       pVideo = (UINT16*)SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
03060 
03061       pDest = gpFrameData[ giNumFrames ];
03062 
03063       for(iCountY=SCREEN_HEIGHT-1; iCountY >=0 ; iCountY-=1)
03064       {
03065             for(iCountX=0; iCountX < SCREEN_WIDTH; iCountX+= 1)
03066             {
03067       //          uiData=(UINT16)*(pVideo+(iCountY*SCREEN_WIDTH*2)+ ( iCountX * 2 ) );
03068 
03069 //                      1111 1111 1100 0000
03070 //                      f            f          c
03071       //          usPixel555= (UINT16)(uiData&0xffff);
03072 //                usPixel555= ((usPixel555 & 0xffc0) >> 1) | (usPixel555 & 0x1f);
03073 
03074       //          usPixel555= (UINT16)(uiData);
03075                   
03076             //    fwrite( &usPixel555, sizeof(UINT16), 1, disk);
03077       //          fwrite(     (void *)(((UINT8 *)SurfaceDescription.lpSurface) + ( iCountY * SCREEN_WIDTH * 2) + ( iCountX * 2 ) ), 2 * sizeof( BYTE ), 1, disk );
03078 
03079              *( pDest + ( iCountY * SCREEN_WIDTH ) + ( iCountX ) ) = *( pVideo + ( iCountY * SCREEN_WIDTH ) + ( iCountX ) );
03080             }
03081 
03082       }
03083       
03084       giNumFrames++;
03085 
03086       if ( giNumFrames == MAX_NUM_FRAMES )
03087       {
03088             RefreshMovieCache( );
03089       }
03090 
03091 
03092   ZEROMEM(SurfaceDescription);
03093   SurfaceDescription.dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
03094   ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Unlock(gpPrimarySurface, &SurfaceDescription);
03095       if ((ReturnCode != DD_OK)&&(ReturnCode != DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING))
03096   {
03097     DirectXAttempt ( ReturnCode, __LINE__, __FILE__ );    
03098   }
03099 
03100 //    fclose(disk);
03101 
03102 }

03104 
03105 void VideoCaptureToggle(void)
03106 {
03107 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03108       VideoMovieCapture( (BOOLEAN)!gfVideoCapture);
03109 #endif
03110 }
03111 
03112 void VideoMovieCapture( BOOLEAN fEnable )
03113 {
03114       INT32 cnt;
03115 
03116       gfVideoCapture=fEnable;
03117       if(fEnable)
03118       {
03119             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_NUM_FRAMES; cnt++ )
03120             {
03121                   gpFrameData[ cnt ] = (UINT16 *)MemAlloc( SCREEN_WIDTH * SCREEN_HEIGHT * 2 );
03122             }
03123 
03124             giNumFrames = 0;
03125 
03126             guiLastFrame=GetTickCount();
03127       }
03128       else
03129       {
03130             RefreshMovieCache( );
03131 
03132             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_NUM_FRAMES; cnt++ )
03133             {
03134                   if ( gpFrameData[ cnt ] != NULL )
03135                   {
03136                         MemFree( gpFrameData[ cnt ] );
03137                   }
03138             }
03139             giNumFrames = 0;
03140       }
03141 }
03142 
03143 void RefreshMovieCache( )
03144 {
03145       TARGA_HEADER Header;
03146       INT32 iCountX, iCountY;
03147       FILE *disk;
03148       CHAR8 cFilename[_MAX_PATH];
03149       static UINT32 uiPicNum=0;
03150       UINT16 *pDest;
03151       INT32 cnt;
03152       STRING512               DataDir;
03153       STRING512               ExecDir;
03154 
03155       PauseTime( TRUE );
03156 
03157       // Snap: save current directory
03158       GetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
03159       
03160       GetExecutableDirectory( ExecDir );
03161       SetFileManCurrentDirectory( ExecDir );
03162 
03163       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < giNumFrames; cnt++ )
03164       {
03165             sprintf( cFilename, "JA%5.5d.TGA", uiPicNum++ );
03166 
03167             if( ( disk = fopen(cFilename, "wb"))==NULL )
03168                   return;
03169 
03170             memset(&Header, 0, sizeof(TARGA_HEADER));
03171 
03172             Header.ubTargaType=2;               // Uncompressed 16/24/32 bit
03173             Header.usImageWidth=SCREEN_WIDTH;
03174             Header.usImageHeight=SCREEN_HEIGHT;
03175             Header.ubBitsPerPixel=16;
03176 
03177             fwrite(&Header, sizeof(TARGA_HEADER), 1, disk);
03178 
03179             pDest = gpFrameData[ cnt ];
03180 
03181             for(iCountY=SCREEN_HEIGHT-1; iCountY >=0 ; iCountY-=1)
03182             {
03183                   for(iCountX=0; iCountX < SCREEN_WIDTH; iCountX ++ )
03184                   {
03185                          fwrite( ( pDest + ( iCountY * SCREEN_WIDTH ) + iCountX ), sizeof(UINT16), 1, disk);
03186                   }
03187 
03188             }
03189 
03190             fclose(disk);
03191       }
03192 
03193       PauseTime( FALSE );
03194 
03195       giNumFrames = 0;
03196 
03197       // Snap: Restore the data directory once we are finished.
03198       SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
03199       //strcat( ExecDir, "\\Data" );
03200       //SetFileManCurrentDirectory( ExecDir );
03201 }
